That's unusual...\""},{"lineNumber":42724,"originalJapaneseLine":"「たまにはそういう日もあるだろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sometimes you have days like that."},{"lineNumber":42725,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さあ出発だー。がははははは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, let's go! Gahahahaha!\""},{"lineNumber":42726,"originalJapaneseLine":"首を捻るマジックを置いて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Leaving behind Magic who was tilting his head in confusion,"},{"lineNumber":42727,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは上機嫌で再び東部へと出発した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance cheerfully departed again for the eastern region."},{"lineNumber":42728,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス東部　ニカニカ平原――","translatedEnglishLine":"Zeth Eastern Region - Nikanika Plains --"},{"lineNumber":42729,"originalJapaneseLine":"「申し上げます！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Reporting!"},{"lineNumber":42730,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス総統がマークに帰投、","translatedEnglishLine":"The supreme leader Rance has returned to Mark,"},{"lineNumber":42731,"originalJapaneseLine":"　再びこちらへ向かっているとのことです！」","translatedEnglishLine":"and is heading back this way!\""},{"lineNumber":42732,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス！　無事だったか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rance! Are you safe!?"},{"lineNumber":42733,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よかった……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thank goodness...\""},{"lineNumber":42734,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーーー……首の皮一枚、繋がったかな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew... I guess he barely escaped with his skin intact.\""},{"lineNumber":42735,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人は安堵の溜息をついた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The two let out sighs of relief."},{"lineNumber":42736,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし……状況は悪化しています。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However... the situation is worsening."},{"lineNumber":42737,"originalJapaneseLine":"　士気の低下、魔軍の食料略奪の激化……","translatedEnglishLine":"Morale is dropping, demon army's food looting intensifies..."},{"lineNumber":42738,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それによる飢えの被害も広がっています」","translatedEnglishLine":"And starvation caused by it is count.\""},{"lineNumber":42740,"originalJapaneseLine":"「総統健在の報を兵に伝えて。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tell the soldiers that the supreme leader is alive."},{"lineNumber":42741,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それで、少しは士気を……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe that will boost morale a little...\""},{"lineNumber":42742,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ……センサー地蔵からの受信なので、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No... since the message came from the sensor Jizo,"},{"lineNumber":42743,"originalJapaneseLine":"　既に通信兵から、他の兵にも伝わっています。","translatedEnglishLine":"it has already been relayed to the other soldiers by the communicators."},{"lineNumber":42744,"originalJapaneseLine":"　しかし…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"However...\""},{"lineNumber":42745,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………ダメか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...It's no good, huh?\""},{"lineNumber":42746,"originalJapaneseLine":"「絶望しています、皆。","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone is in despair."},{"lineNumber":42747,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人を倒せる総統さえ、一度負けた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Even the supreme leader who can defeat demon lords has lost once."},{"lineNumber":42748,"originalJapaneseLine":"　帰って来ても、無理ではないかと…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"They think it might be impossible even if he returns...\""},{"lineNumber":42749,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……とは言っても、逃げ場はない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...That said, there's nowhere to run."},{"lineNumber":42750,"originalJapaneseLine":"　待機継続だ。そう通達してくれ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Keep holding position. Please pass that on.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さーて、出発だ出発だ。
今度こそ、あの大食い野郎に勝つ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This time for sure, I'll beat that gluttonous bastard."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはすっきりした表情で、
マークを出発しようとしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was about to depart from Mark.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ホント、頼むわよ……
間違っても、死んだり……しないでよね」
「心配するな。俺は無敵だ」
「負けて帰って来たばっかりじゃない。
もう……励まし甲斐のない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no point encouraging you anymore."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ルートは、前回と同じ……で良いわよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The route will be the same as last time... that's fine, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここ、マークから……
「ここ。サイアスたちのいる、前線」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Here. The front line where Saias and the others are."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、任せておけ。
サクッと行って帰ってきてやる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll get there and back quickly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ん。そうして。
…………あれ？　そういえば……
マジックは、不思議そうに周囲を見回した。
「どうかしたか？」
「千鶴子がいないの。
いつもは誰よりも早く司令室にいるのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's always the first in the command room..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーん、そうなのか。
部屋で寝てるんじゃないのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe she's sleeping in her room?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうなのかしら……珍しい……」
「たまにはそういう日もあるだろ。
さあ出発だー。がははははは！」
首を捻るマジックを置いて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leaving behind Magic who was tilting his head in confusion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは上機嫌で再び東部へと出発した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance cheerfully departed again for the eastern region.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス東部　ニカニカ平原――
「申し上げます！
ランス総統がマークに帰投、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The supreme leader Rance has returned to Mark,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 再びこちらへ向かっているとのことです！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and is heading back this way!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス！　無事だったか！」
「よかった……」
「ふーーー……首の皮一枚、繋がったかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Phew... I guess he barely escaped with his skin intact."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人は安堵の溜息をついた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two let out sighs of relief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし……状況は悪化しています。
士気の低下、魔軍の食料略奪の激化……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Morale is dropping, demon army's food looting intensifies...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それによる飢えの被害も広がっています」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And starvation caused by it is spreading."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「脱走兵も増えたな……もう、数えるのも面倒だが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Deserters have increased... it's gotten too troublesome even to count."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統健在の報を兵に伝えて。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tell the soldiers that the supreme leader is alive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それで、少しは士気を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe that will boost morale a little..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ……センサー地蔵からの受信なので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No... since the message came from the sensor Jizo,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に通信兵から、他の兵にも伝わっています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it has already been relayed to the other soldiers by the communicators.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「絶望しています、皆。
魔人を倒せる総統さえ、一度負けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even the supreme leader who can defeat demon lords has lost once.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 帰って来ても、無理ではないかと…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They think it might be impossible even if he returns..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……とは言っても、逃げ場はない。
待機継続だ。そう通達してくれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Keep holding position. Please pass that on."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
